tool_description: Corrects/restores the capitalization of text, taking proper nouns into account.
name: Sentence Case Converter - Truecaser
title: Sentence Case Converter - Truecaser

api_list.name: Sentence Case
api_list.description: Converts text to sentence case. See the "About" tab for a detailed description of the parameters. Please note that the unit for your quota is characters, not requests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentence-case-converter-truecaser.p.rapidapi.com/v1/SentenceCase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentence-case-converter-truecaser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
